```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_knit$set(
  stop_on_error = 2L
)

```

### Zelig Inheritance Tree

Zelig 5 supports the following models:

```{r echo=FALSE}
library(networkD3)

zelig_core <- list(name = "Zelig",
                   children = list(
                       list(name = "Core",
                            children = list(
                                list(name = "timeseries",
                                     children = list(
                                         list(name = "ar"),
                                         list(name = "ma"),
                                         list(name = "arima")
                                     )),
                                list(name = "survey",
                                    children = list(
                                         list(name = "poisson"),
                                         list(name = "gamma"),
                                         list(name = "normal"),
                                         list(name = "binchoice",
                                              children = list(
                                                  list(name = "probit"),
                                                  list(name = "logit")
                                              ))
                                     )),
                                list(name = "wiebull"),
                                list(name = "bayes",
                                    children = list(
                                        list(name = "logitbayes"),
                                        list(name = "mlogitbayes")
                                        )),
                                list(name = "factorbayes"),
                                list(name = "gee",
                                    children = list(
                                        list(name = "gamma gee")
                                        )),
                                list(name = "relogit"),
                                list(name = "quantile"),
                                list(name = "tobit"),
                                list(name = "lognorm"),
                                list(name = "exp"),
                                list(name = "negbin"),
                                list(name = "glm",
                                    children = list(
                                        list(name = "gamma"),
                                        list(name = "normal"),
                                        list(name = "poisson")
                                        )),
                                list(name = "ls")
                            )),
                       list(name = "Choice",
                            children = list(
                                list(name = "obinchoice"),
                                list(name = "mlogit"),
                                list(name = "bbinchoice")
                            )),
                       list(name = "GAM",
                            children = list(
                                list(name = "gam")
                            )),
                       list(name = "EI",
                            children = list(
                                list(name = "ei")
                            ))
                   ))

diagonalNetwork(zelig_core, fontSize = 15, fontFamily = 'sans-serif', nodeStroke = 'd16103')
```
